A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lifelong Star Wars fan who grew up on the series\, I can say that The Last Jedi is both the most divisive movie in the franchise and an incredible addition to it as well. I imagine it is what the Empire Strikes Back must have been like in that it completely does the unexpected time and time again. The Last Jedi certainly has flaws\, but after seeing it several times and thinking on it at length\, my humble opinion is that this is among the best Star Wars movies so far. A ton of fun\, full of surprises\, thrilling moments\, many new directions for the series\, and that familiar Star Wars quirkiness and humor we’ve come to love.
